Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute near California/Belmont
ShortDescription: #94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Belmont.

Northbound buses will operate via California, Addison, Rockwell, then will wait recovery time.

Southbound buses will operate via Addison, Western, Belmont, then resume their normal route on California

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #39 Pershing Reroute at Pershing/Western
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted near Pershing/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pershing, Archer, Damen, Pershing, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Pershing/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 63rd
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing with major delays at 63rd due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
